mapper.select: SELECT b.*, (SELECT id FROM loves WHERE usersId = #{principalId} AND boardsId = #{boardsId}) lovesId, (SELECT 1 FROM loves WHERE usersId = #{principalId} AND boardsId = #{boardsId}) isLoved, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM loves WHERE boardsId = #{boardsId}) loveCount FROM boards b WHERE b.id = #{boardsId}

SELECT b.id, b.title, if(u.username is null, '익명', u.username) AS username FROM boards b LEFT OUTER JOIN users u ON b.usersId = u.id
WHERE title like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
ORDER BY b.id DESC OFFSET #{startNum} ROWS FETCH NEXT 5 ROWS ONLY
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO boards (title, content, usersId, createdAt) VALUES(#{title}, #{content}, #{usersId}, NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE boards SET title = #{title}, content = #{content} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE boards SET usersId = NULL WHERE usersId = #{usersId}
